superHeroes.name: Batman
superHeroes.catchPhrase: I am the vengeance, I am the night, I am BATMAN!

superHeroes.name: Wonder Woman
superHeroes.catchPhrase: A deal is a promise and a promise is unbreakable.

superHeroes.name: Thor
superHeroes.catchPhrase: You know, I used to want to be a Valkyrie when I was younger, until I found out you were all women. There’s nothing wrong with women, of course, I like women. Sometimes a little too much. Not in a creepy way, just more like a respectful appreciation. I think it’s great, an elite force of women warriors.

superHeroes.name: Superman
superHeroes.catchPhrase: You will be different, sometimes you’ll feel like an outcast, but you’ll never be alone.

superHeroes.name: Aquaman
superHeroes.catchPhrase: I call it an ass whopping
